name: Journey of life (Beta)
description:
Take a short walk about life
The game is created during "Global StartupCities Game Jam"
This game is relaxing 2d 1 bit retro platformer game. Made only during jam as submission, the game is at very beta level, if you want to be updated about game's development and want to participate in development of game you can join  Discord server.
Since, this is just jam prototype it is only on itch.io. But second prototype will be posted soon

STAY TUNED!!!!

Features:
Relaxing and unique gameplay, 1 bit art.
works on most devices since it is only 1 bit.

have a good day.
Credits:
development - ONE EDITOR GAMES
music (external asset) - https://one-editor-games.itch.io/campfire-of-memories 
font (external asset)- https://www.fontspace.com/pixel-emulator-font-f21507
